nodes.content: Growing up near Copacabana beach, I learned that crystal-clear water brings people together for the best celebrations.
Started Piscina Perfeita with just a testing kit and a dream to make every pool in Rio sparkle like the ocean.
The secret to perfect pool chemistry is like making a perfect caipirinha - it's all about the right balance of ingredients.
During Carnival season, everyone wants their pool perfect for parties - it's my busiest and most rewarding time of year.
I once turned a green, algae-covered hotel pool into crystal perfection in just 24 hours before a major wedding celebration.
The sound of children laughing and splashing in a perfectly maintained pool is the best reward for my work.
I sponsor local beach volleyball tournaments because sports and water activities build community spirit.
Teaching pool safety workshops to children is serious work, but I always make it fun with games and colorful equipment.
My underwater LED lights don't just illuminate pools - they create magical spaces where memories are made under the stars.
The rooftop infinity pool overlooking Sugarloaf Mountain is my favorite maintenance job - the view never gets old.
